name: Those Who Crawl
description:
​As you progressed through the cave tunnels, they slowly tightened until you could not even stand. Now, as you crawl, you wonder if you are not alone in the darkness.

Those Who Crawl is a short but tense horror game about crawling and climbing through tunnels.
Each hand is controlled individually with a unique crawling and climbing system.



The game is about a half-hour long and features AI monsters, environmental hazards, climbing, and crawling.
